headline: Wrongful Death Lawsuit Filed Against Exxon Mobil, Burger King, Bolla Oil/Markets For “Woefully Deficient Security” at Site of Brooklyn Hate-Crime Murder of O’Shae Sibley
summary: As store staff watched, the beloved, unarmed gay dancer was berated then fatally stabbed two years ago todayBROOKLYN, N.Y., July 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Exxon Mobil Corporation, Burger King Company, and Bolla Oil Corp. (and affiliates), are among the defendants named in a negligence-wrongful death complaint that alleges they are jointly responsible for the July 29, 2023, preventable stabbing death of beloved dancer-choreographer O’Shae Sibley, 28.
